questions.question: Which material is used in connecting rod?
Which force is experienced by connecting rod?
The connecting rod is manufactured using which process?
The rod that transmits reciprocating motion to rotary motion is known as?
What is the basic function of the connecting rod?

answers.a: To transmit force from piston to crankshaft
answers.b: To transmit rotary motion from the piston to the crankshaft
answers.c: To transmit oscillation from piston to crankshaft
answers.d: To transmit force from piston to piston pin
